oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Poem concerning Prophet Muḥammad's Ascension to heaven.
Title page with publication data missing, pp. 1-16 and all after 56 missing. Lacks covers and binding disintegrated.
Scribal note on p. 56 records completion date as Wednesday 8 pos/sûd 1905 s./1849.
MS Indic 2534. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
In various Indic languages in Khojki script.
